reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress elegant. The fit receives mixed feedback.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant sexy and comfortable.
items.body: Very nice and sexy dress the lace looks elegant the heart collar highlights the neckline and the long sleeves give it a sophisticated touch the fabric is comfortable and the fit favors the figure Ideal for parties or dinners Read more
items.author: Alvarez G

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dress for a Night Out
items.body: I LOOOOVED this dress. I was worried it would show all my unflattering bulges or not give any shape, but it was perfect. Didn’t have to wear any shape wear underneath either. Lightweight, comfortable, moves great! Wore for my bachelorette night out. Highly recommend! I should get in other colors because I love it that much. But I never wear white so I have no other use for it Lol Read more
items.author: Laurie Hargis

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple & Flirty
items.body: Ordered this dress in white, size small which is a US size 4. It was the right size for my daughter who has a small athletic build. It has long fitted sleeves, waist rouching, and a pleated two-tiered skirt. It is very bosom forward so if you're on the bustier side and don't want all of your cleavage out, this might not be the dress for you. I really like how the dress wore on her shape. It ran mid-thigh, not too short and age-appropriate clothing. The fabric is soft with some stretch, again, order the proper size or you'll see and feel that it's not the proper size for you. I also like the style and cut of the dress. It's flirty and simple and can be work to dinner or a party with her friends. It's also inexpensive, priced at $29.99 which is good value for the money. Read more
items.author: Adi3000

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Is not true to size
items.body: Did not fit out the picture looks Read more
items.author: Desiree

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice material
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Cute dress, true to size will show alot of cleavage because of low cut which is always nice. Perfect length and sleeves aren't tight. The material have alot of stretch just be mindful of the sleeves but if you get your right fit, you should be great Read more
items.author: Tiffany

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars not the worst, not the best
items.body: The red is just a little off from fire engine red which is a bit disappointing since that particular red looks great on my skin. The bow is off center on mine which kind of speaks to not exactly the best quality. I will cut mine off... I think the little bow makes it look cheap anyways. Size wise, because who can shop online without that very important info! My Stats: 5'10" 33-26-37 32B ~140lbs Ordered size small - it fits exactly as it should BUT if you are between sizes, order up. It's snug and fits me nicely, but if it shrinks at all when I wash it, it won't. Also, if you eat a huge meal in this--that after-dinner belly bump will show! haha Not everyone cares but figured I'd share just in case. I think this could be a really cute dress but I hate that the little bow is even on it. TBH if I had noticed it before ordering it, I would never have bought it. Read more
items.author: Nyssa Correa

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Winered, White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
